meanings.sent1: The loud thunder disquiets my dog.
meanings.sent2: The thought of failing the test disquiets me.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a spider in my room disquiets me.
meanings.sent4: The eerie silence of the abandoned house disquiets my soul.
meanings.sent5: The howling wind disquiets the peaceful night.

meanings.definition: A feeling of unease or anxiety
meanings.sent1: Her constant disquiets kept her from sleeping.
meanings.sent2: The disquiets in his mind were hard to ignore.
meanings.sent3: The disquiets of the haunted house made her laugh nervously.
meanings.sent4: The disquiets in her heart were like a storm brewing.
meanings.sent5: The disquiets of uncertainty clouded her thoughts.
